SELECT b.BATTLE_ID, b.CHARACTER_ID, b.BATTLE_TYPE, b.OPPONENT_ID, b.IS_WIN, b.TURN_COUNT, b.CREATED_DATE, b.CREATED_BY, b.UPDATED_DATE, b.UPDATED_BY, c.CHARACTER_NAME AS characterName,
CASE WHEN b.BATTLE_TYPE = 'PVP' THEN oc.CHARACTER_NAME WHEN b.BATTLE_TYPE = 'PVE' THEN m.MONSTER_NAME ELSE NULL END AS opponentName
FROM TB_BATTLE_LOG b LEFT JOIN TB_CHARACTER c ON b.CHARACTER_ID = c.CHARACTER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CHARACTER oc ON b.OPPONENT_ID = oc.CHARACTER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MONSTER m ON b.OPPONENT_ID = m.MONSTER_ID
WHERE b.CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId} OR b.OPPONENT_ID = #{characterId} ORDER BY b.CREATED_DATE DESC
